entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to rain showers this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this morning and this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
